sql.src_select_pptn_sql: SELECT STCD, TM, DRP, INTV FROM (SELECT STCD, TM, DRP, INTV FROM ST_PPTN_R WHERE TM > TO_DATE(:f1<char[32]>, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TM <= TO_DATE(:f2<char[32]>, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY STCD ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100 ;
sql.src_select_stbprp_sql: SELECT  STCD, STNM, RVNM, HNNM, BSNM, LGTD, LTTD, STLC, ADDVCD, DTMNM, DTMEL, DTPR, STTP, FRGRD, ESSTYM, BGFRYM, ATCUNIT, ADMAUTH, LOCALITY, STBK, STAzt, DSTRVM, DRNA, PHCD, USFL, COMMENTS, MODITIME, HNNM0, ADCD, ADDVCD1 FROM ST_STBPRP_B;
sql.des_select_pptn_sql: SELECT STCD, TM, DRP, INTV FROM "TEST"."ST_PPTN_R" WHERE TM > :f1<char[32]> AND TM <= :f2<char[32]> ORDER BY STCD;
sql.des_select_stbprp_sql: SELECT  STCD, STNM, RVNM, HNNM, BSNM, LGTD, LTTD, STLC, ADDVCD, DTMNM, DTMEL, DTPR, STTP, FRGRD, ESSTYM, BGFRYM, ATCUNIT, ADMAUTH, LOCALITY, STBK, STAzt, DSTRVM, DRNA, PHCD, USFL, COMMENTS, MODITIME, HNNM0, ADCD, ADDVCD1 FROM "TEST"."ST_STBPRP_B";
